post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
My wife and myself had a long discussion. It means my wife did most of talking. My wife, Dianne, gave me some guide line and ground rules to operate my summer office.
Business Day and Hour - Office is closed on Mon and Tue - Office will be closed at 12:00 o'clock during weekday - Smoking is allowed under not abusing bad habbit - Bad behavours are strictly prohibited
*ps : These rules are effective immediatly.
Thanks you Dianne and my brothers and sisters call me. I will be waiting.
post.title: My summer office is reopen for business
